ValidationRule.description: This VR will fire if Expected Deal Close Date, Deal Value, Region and Industry is not populated when changing Stage to 'Meeting Booked'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Meeting Booked'), NOT($Setup.Org_Control__c.Validation_Rule__c), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(StageName) ), OR( ISBLANK(Expected_Deal_Close_Date__c), ISBLANK(Deal_value__c), ISBLANK(Region__c), ISPICKVAL(Industry__c, '') )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: OV1: Please fill in Expected Deal Close Date, Deal Value, Region, and Industry when changing Stage to Meeting Booked.
